holidays.title: Better Breakfast Day
holidays.description: Wake up America — let's make the most of our mornings!

holidays.title: Johnny Appleseed Day
holidays.description: Yes, this American legend was a living, breathing, historical human being!

holidays.title: National Chimichanga Day
holidays.description: Celebrating one of history's greatest culinary accidents — the deep-fried goodness that is the chimichanga.

holidays.title: National Family Day
holidays.description: Take some time today to appreciate the people that make our lives meaningful.

holidays.title: National Pancake Day
holidays.description: Get those hotcakes on the griddle, it’s time to prepare some pancakes!

holidays.title: Alpaca Day
holidays.description: Alpaca Owners Association founded Alpaca Day to educate people about alpacas.

holidays.title: Dominion Status Day
holidays.description: Join us as New Zealand celebrates independence on Dominion Status Day.

holidays.title: European Day of Languages
holidays.description: Are you ready to learn another language? E.D.L. is the perfect day to do it!

holidays.title: European Languages Day
holidays.description: Be inspired and brush up on your language learning skills for an enriching and fulfilling life.

holidays.title: FAMILY AND COMMUNITY DAY
holidays.description: Spare some time off work to celebrate with your family and community!

holidays.title: Human Resource Professional Day
holidays.description: H.R. professional or not, this day can be celebrated by everybody!

holidays.title: International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons
holidays.description: Get ready to learn the history of this important day right here with us!

holidays.title: Love Note Day
holidays.description: Grab a pen and paper and get ready to celebrate someone special this Love Note Day.

holidays.title: Lumberjack Day
holidays.description: Lumberjacks are the real deal! Join in the celebration as we appreciate these hardworking professionals.

holidays.title: Maharaja Agrasen Jayanti
holidays.description: This Maharaja Agrasen Jayanti, follow in the king’s footsteps and participate in social welfare activities.

holidays.title: Maldives: Qaumee Dhuvas
holidays.description: Observe the day to commemorate the victory in remembrance of Muhammad Thakurufaanu al-Auzam.

holidays.title: Mera Chaoren Houba
holidays.description: Mera Chaoren Houba is observed according to the Manipuri lunar calendar, a region in northeast India.

holidays.title: Mysore Dasara
holidays.description: A celebration where divine fervor meets royal splendor!

holidays.title: National Amanda Day
holidays.description: Amanda is a feminine, elegant name with ancient origin, derived from the Latin word ‘amare.’

holidays.title: National Compliance Officer Day
holidays.description: A day for all those who ensure an ethical and safe environment for organizations to thrive.

holidays.title: National Day of Praise and Worship
holidays.description: September 26 is dedicated to praise and worship, which is an important aspect of Christianity.

holidays.title: National Dumpling Day
holidays.description: No matter your ancestry, you probably have some form of dumpling in your history.

holidays.title: National Hari Day
holidays.description: Hari is a masculine name of Sanskrit origin with deep religious significance.

holidays.title: National Law Enforcement Suicide Awareness Day
holidays.description: Do not miss celebrating National Law Enforcement Suicide Awareness Day this September 26!

holidays.title: National Mesothelioma Awareness Day
holidays.description: Mesothelioma Awareness Day to educate Americans affected by, or in danger of being affected by, asbestos.

holidays.title: National Situational Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let us draw your attention to the importance of situational awareness.

holidays.title: Navratri
holidays.description: Sharada Navrati is an autumnal Hindu holiday, held in honor of the divine feminine: "Devi."

holidays.title: Shamu the Whale Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the remarkable life of orcas on Shamu the Whale Day.

holidays.title: World Day of Migrants and Refugees
holidays.description: Join us as we recognize the plight of those who are forced to flee their homes.

holidays.title: Ant Antixx’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber is a few uploads away from unmatched fame and success!

holidays.title: Asuka’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fierce and feisty Japanese wrestler isn’t planning on retiring any time soon.

holidays.title: Johnny Appleseed’s Birthday
holidays.description: If you enjoy eating apples, it might be the legacy of this historic nurseryman’s work.

holidays.title: Killumantii’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper is one chart-topping track away from a Grammy award!

holidays.title: Lilly Singh’s Birthday
holidays.description: Not only is she an entertaining comedian, but she’s also a human and children's rights activist!

holidays.title: Sherri Gaskins’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this blogger and YouTuber, limitless fame and recognition are a few posts away!
